name: Shadow Blood VR
description:
Synopsys
The wise and powerful Akand which is created by creators was a guardian of Nar continent.
Akand became to the corrupted Malevolent Dragon while summon the great demon Belzav
And Lucia is created from the good part of Akand
Lucia is going to help the Blood knight of Arand kingdom in the continent of Nar.
Please defend the continent of Nar from corrupted Akand as a blood knight.

Playing method: Operation method
The player can head-track using the HTC Vive and manipulate the character's detailed control with HTC Vive motion controllers.

Playing method: Game screen composition
The game supports HTC Vive and is fully compatible with the controller.
The game screen is first-person view. We minimized the UI in VR and optimized the UI of each platform.

Main features
- Experience 10 stages and the various waves by stage
- Stage clear with various weapons and skill combo
- Challenge the higher rank with quicker clear.
